title: How an unscheduled ‘poop’ emergency wasn’t going to stop Mathieu van der Poel
content:
Dutch star becomes world champion despite urgent mid-race nature stop in fan's house: 'I couldn't have carried on racing without their help.'

Read the full article at How an unscheduled ‘poop’ emergency wasn’t going to stop Mathieu van der Poel on Velo.
author: ahood
